title: Hot Soccer
author: VD
content_html: I’m all for hot pants in women’s soccer. It is ironic that Herr Blatter will probably be far more infamous for this statement, which is actually quite reasonable from a marketing point of view, than for the fact that he is one of the most outrageously corrupt officials ever to grace the sporting world. His re-election to FIFA presidency was a masterpiece of political intrigue.
content_text:
I’m all for
hot pants in women’s soccer
.  It is ironic that Herr Blatter will probably be far more infamous for this statement, which is actually quite reasonable from a marketing point of view, than for the fact that he is one of the most outrageously corrupt officials ever to grace the sporting world.  His re-election to FIFA presidency was a masterpiece of political intrigue.
